trans-unit.source: Alaborn Cavalier
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: If Alaborn Cavalier attacks, you may choose to tap any one creature. (Tapped creatures can't block.)
"Course he ran! *I* wouldn't want to stare down that barrel, either!"\n—Alaborn soldier
Alaborn Grenadier
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Attacking doesn't cause Alaborn Grenadier to tap.
"Ever proud, ever vigilant."\n—Grenadier motto
Alaborn Musketeer
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Alaborn Musketeer can block creatures with flying.
Muskets gave the Alaborn army an advantage it had long lacked—air defense.
Alaborn Trooper
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: "I dedicate my body to my country And my life to my King."\n—Alaborn Soldier's Oath
Alaborn Veteran
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: On your turn, before you attack, you may tap Alaborn Veteran to give any one creature +2/+2 until the end of the turn.
Alaborn Zealot
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: If Alaborn Zealot blocks, destroy both Alaborn Zealot and the creature it blocks. (Destroy both creatures before you deal damage.)

trans-unit.resname: P02·7 | Angel of Fury | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Angel of Fury
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: P02·7 | Angel of Fury | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Flying If Angel of Fury is put into your graveyard from play, you may choose to shuffle Angel of Fury into your library.

trans-unit.resname: P02·8 | Angel of Mercy | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Flying When Angel of Mercy comes into play from your hand, you gain 3 life.
Any one creature gets +3/+3 and gains flying until the end of the turn.
The man who rose up to fight was not the same man knocked down.
Flying Walls can't attack.
Be at peace, and observe its beauty. Be at war, and feel its justice.
Flying Attacking doesn't cause Archangel to tap.
Destroy all lands. (This includes your lands.)
War destroys more than just the land. War destroys hope.
Armored Griffin
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Flying Attacking doesn't cause Armored Griffin to tap.
Bargain
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Your opponent draws a card. You gain 7 life.
Bargaining with a goblin is like trading with a child; both believe they already own everything.

trans-unit.resname: P02·15 | Breath of Life | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Take any one creature card from your graveyard and put that creature into play. Treat it as though you just played it from your hand.

trans-unit.resname: P02·16 | Festival of Trokin | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Festival of Trokin
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: P02·16 | Festival of Trokin | Card Text
trans-unit.source: For each creature you have in play, you gain 2 life.

trans-unit.resname: P02·16 | Festival of Trokin | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Everyone loves a good sale.
Just Fate
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Play Just Fate only after you're attacked, before you declare blockers. Destroy any one attacking creature.

trans-unit.resname: P02·18 | Path of Peace | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Destroy any one creature. That creature's owner gains 4 life.

trans-unit.resname: P02·18 | Path of Peace | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "You could die famous or you could die old. I chose old."\n—Former soldier

trans-unit.resname: P02·19 | Rally the Troops | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Play Rally the Troops only after you're attacked, before you declare blockers. Untap all your creatures.
All your creatures get +2/+2 until the end of the turn.
"Bravery shines brightest in a pure soul."\n—Restela, Alaborn marshal
Righteous Fury
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Destroy all tapped creatures. For each creature destroyed this way, you gain 2 life. (This includes your creatures.)
Steam Catapult
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: On your turn, before you attack, you may tap Steam Catapult to destroy any one tapped creature.
"You idiots! Turn it around! Turn it around!"
Temple Acolyte
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: When Temple Acolyte comes into play from your hand, you gain 3 life.
Young, yes. Inexperienced, yes. Weak? Don't count on it.
Temple Elder
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: On your turn, before you attack, you may tap Temple Elder to gain 1 life.
"Give us breath. Give us life. Prepare us for the day we make."\n—The Alaborn "Rite of Battle"
Town Sentry
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: If Town Sentry blocks, it gets +0/+2 until the end of the turn.
"So he gots a sword. Big deal."\n"Yeah, it's a big deal—it's a big sword!"\n—Two goblins outside the gates of Trokin

trans-unit.resname: P02·26 | Trokin High Guard | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Trokin High Guard
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: P02·26 | Trokin High Guard | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Battle tempers soldiers as fire tempers steel.
Destroy any one tapped creature.
A bullet renders all sizes equal.
People fight hardest on their own soil.
Play Warrior's Stand only after you're attacked, before you declare blockers. All your creatures get +2/+2 until the end of the turn.
Flying
Two little goblins, out in the sun. Down came a griffin, and then there was one.
Flying
As insubstantial, and as powerful, as the wind that carries it.
Apprentice Sorcerer
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: On your turn, before you attack, you may tap Apprentice Sorcerer to have it deal 1 damage to any one creature or player.
Armored Galleon
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Armored Galleon can't attack unless the defending player has an island in play.
"Information equals profits. Our merchants sell it, or our pirates use it."\n—Jefan, Talas ship captain
Coastal Wizard
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: On your turn, before you attack, you may tap Coastal Wizard to return it and any one other creature to their owners' hands.

trans-unit.resname: P02·35 | Denizen of the Deep | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When Denizen of the Deep comes into play from your hand, return all your other creatures from play to your hand.
Return any one sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
History is the study of repetition.
At the beginning of your opponent's next turn, he or she skips untapping creatures and lands.
Play Extinguish only in response to another player playing a sorcery. That sorcery has no effect, and that player puts it into his or her graveyard.
Eye Spy
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Look at the top card of any player's library. You may choose to put that card back on top of that library or into that player's graveyard.
False Summoning
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Play False Summoning only in response to another player playing a creature. That creature card has no effect, and that player puts it into his or her graveyard.
Play Mystic Denial only in response to another player playing a creature or a sorcery. That card has no effect, and that player puts it into his or her graveyard.
Piracy
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: This turn, you may tap your opponent's lands to help pay for your spells.
The sea gives, and the sea takes. Some just help with the taking.
Remove
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Play Remove only after you're attacked, before you declare blockers. Return any one attacking creature to its owner's hand.

trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Flying When Screeching Drake comes into play from your hand, draw a card, then choose and discard a card from your hand.
Flying When Sea Drake comes into play from your hand, return any two of your lands from play to your hand.

trans-unit.resname: P02·46 | Sleight of Hand | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other on the bottom of your library.
Steam Frigate
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Steam Frigate can't attack unless the defending player has an island in play.
"Is it merchants or is it pirates?"\n"It's Talas—there's no difference."

trans-unit.resname: P02·48 | Talas Air Ship | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Talas Air Ship
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: P02·48 | Talas Air Ship | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Flying

trans-unit.resname: P02·48 | Talas Air Ship | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Their ships pollute our air as they themselves pollute our forest."\n—Arathel, elvish queen
Talas Explorer
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Flying When Talas Explorer comes into play from your hand, look at your opponent's hand.
Talas Merchant
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: The trader let loose a laugh that made all around him check their purses.
Talas Researcher
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: On your turn, before you attack, you may tap Talas Researcher to draw a card.
From time, knowledge. From knowledge, power.
Talas Scout
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Flying
"Scouting a battle before you fight it is just good business."\n—Jefan, Talas ship captain
Talas Warrior
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Talas Warrior can't be blocked.
The sea is in their blood. Literally.
Temporal Manipulation
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: You take another turn after this one.
Doing something at the last minute isn't so bad when you can make that minute last.

trans-unit.resname: P02·55 | Theft of Dreams | Card Text
trans-unit.source: For each tapped creature your opponent has in play, you draw a card.

trans-unit.resname: P02·55 | Theft of Dreams | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "First they fight, then they sleep, then they dream. And finally I receive my reward."
Tap any one, two, or three creatures without flying. (Tapped creatures can't block.)
Four little goblins, trapped by the sea. One teased a serpent, and then there were three.
Return any one creature from play to the top of its owner's library.
"The ogre had come from out of the blue, so that's where I sent it back."\n—Talas wizard

trans-unit.resname: P02·58 | Touch of Brilliance | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Draw two cards.

trans-unit.resname: P02·58 | Touch of Brilliance | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I don't want what I don't have. I want more of what I *do* have."
Return any two creatures from play to their owner's hand. (You can't play Undo unless you can choose two creatures to return.)
Wind Sail
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Any one or two creatures gain flying until the end of the turn.
It pays to be at home both on the sea *and* in the sky.

trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: If Abyssal Nightstalker attacks and isn't blocked, your opponent chooses and discards a card from his or her hand. (Ignore this effect if your opponent doesn't have any cards.)
Draw 3 cards. You lose 3 life.
"Knowledge demands sacrifice."\n—Tojira, swamp queen
Bloodcurdling Scream
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Any one creature gets +X/+0 until the end of the turn.
"I have all the weapons my enemies have—and far deeper rage."\n—Tojira, swamp queen

trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: When Brutal Nightstalker comes into play from your hand, you may force your opponent to choose and discard a card from his or her hand.

trans-unit.resname: P02·65 | Chorus of Woe | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Chorus of Woe
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: P02·65 | Chorus of Woe | Card Text
trans-unit.source: All your creatures get +1/+0 until the end of the turn.

trans-unit.resname: P02·65 | Chorus of Woe | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: When nightstalkers sing, nothing in creation sleeps.
Look at your opponent's hand and choose a card. Your opponent discards that card.
"Human tenderness is simply weakness in a pretty package."\n—Tojira, swamp queen
Your opponent chooses one of his or her creatures. Destroy that creature.
"Such a fragile organ, the brain."\n—Tojira, swamp queen
Dakmor Bat
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Flying
The bat thrives on what underestimates it.
Dakmor Plague
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Dakmor Plague deals 3 damage to each creature and player. (This includes your creatures and you.)
The tiniest cough can be deadlier than the fiercest dragon.
Dakmor Scorpion
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: A scorpion this big you won't find curled up in your boot. Maybe *around* your boot, but not *in* it.
Dakmor Sorceress
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Dakmor Sorceress has power equal to the number of swamp cards you have in play. (This includes both tapped and untapped swamp cards.)
Dark Offering

trans-unit.source: Destroy any one creature that isn't black. You gain 3 life.

trans-unit.source: Flying When Foul Spirit comes into play from your hand, destroy one of your lands.

trans-unit.resname: P02·74 | Hand of Death | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Destroy any one creature that isn't black.

trans-unit.resname: P02·74 | Hand of Death | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The touch of death is never gentle.
When Hidden Horror comes into play from your hand, choose and discard a creature card from your hand or destroy Hidden Horror.

trans-unit.resname: P02·76 | Kiss of Death | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Kiss of Death
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: P02·76 | Kiss of Death | Card Text

trans-unit.source: "I'd sooner lock lips with a viper. At least I might walk away from *that*."\n—Elvish scout

trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: If Lurking Nightstalker attacks, it gets +2/+0 until the end of the turn.

Moaning Spirit
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Flying
The dead sing their own lullabies.
"Just as some fool said it couldn't get worse, the rats began to show up."\n—Alaborn soldier

trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Nightstalker Engine has power equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard.
Part metal, part bone, and all death.
Predatory Nightstalker
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: When Predatory Nightstalker comes into play from your hand, you may force your opponent to destroy any one of his or her creatures. (Your opponent chooses the creature.)

trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Prowling Nightstalker can't be blocked except by other black creatures.
Silent as a serpent, twisted as a lone bog tree, evil as Tojira's heart.
Raiding Nightstalker
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Swampwalk (If defending player has any swamps in play, Raiding Nightstalker can't be blocked.)
"Our steeds need food, water, stabling. Theirs just need prey."\n—Restela, Alaborn marshal

trans-unit.resname: P02·85 | Rain of Daggers | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Rain of Daggers
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: P02·85 | Rain of Daggers | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Destroy all your opponent's creatures. For each creature destroyed this way, you lose 2 life.

trans-unit.source: Knives in the sky, cries in the air, and blood on the ground.
Return any one creature from your graveyard to your hand.
"Life from death is part of the natural cycle. This is merely a shortcut."\n—Tojira, swamp queen
When Ravenous Rats comes into play from your hand, your opponent chooses and discards a card from his or her hand. (Ignore this effect if your opponent doesn't have any cards.)

trans-unit.source: Swarm of Rats has power equal to the number of Rat cards you have in play. (This includes both tapped and untapped Rat cards.)
Flying When Vampiric Spirit comes into play from your hand, you lose 4 life. (The person who plays Vampiric Spirit loses the life.)
Blaze deals X damage to any one creature or player.
"This isn't what I meant by 'facing the heat of battle!'"\n—Jefan, Talas ship captain

trans-unit.source: If Cunning Giant attacks and isn't blocked, you may choose to have it deal its damage to any one of your opponent's creatures instead of to him or her.
Earthquake deals X damage to each player and each creature without flying. (This includes you and your creatures without flying.)
Goblin Cavaliers
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: They get along so well with their goats because they're practically goats themselves.
Goblin Firestarter
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: On your turn, before you attack, you may destroy Goblin Firestarter to have it deal 1 damage to any one creature or player.
Goblin General
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: When Goblin General attacks, all your Goblins get +1/+1 until the end of the turn.
Lead, follow, or run around like crazy.
Flying Goblin Glider can't block.
The goblins call the gliders "death from above." Everyone else calls them "clods in the clouds."
Draw four cards and put them into your hand. Then discard three cards at random from your hand.
"I done forgot more than you'll ever know, pipsqueak."\n"Yeah—that's your problem."
When Goblin Matron comes into play from your hand, search your library for a Goblin card and put that card into your hand. Shuffle your library afterwards.
Mountainwalk (If defending player has any mountains in play, Goblin Mountaineer can't be blocked.)
Goblin mountaineer, barely keeps his family fed.
Once he'd worked out which end of the thing was sharp, he was promoted to guard duty.
Goblin Raider can't block.
"I seen lots o' fights. To win ya gotta bash hard and not get bashed back."\n—Goblin grunt

trans-unit.resname: P02·104 | Goblin War Cry | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Goblin War Cry
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: P02·104 | Goblin War Cry | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Your opponent chooses one of his or her creatures. Only that creature can block this turn.

trans-unit.resname: P02·104 | Goblin War Cry | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Goblins cry, soldiers fly.\nStones fly, soldiers die!"

trans-unit.resname: P02·105 | Goblin War Strike | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Goblin War Strike deals to your opponent damage equal to the number of Goblin cards you have in play. (This includes both tapped and untapped Goblin cards.)
Choose any two creatures. Jagged Lightning deals 3 damage to each of them. (You can't play Jagged Lightning unless you can choose two creatures to damage.)
Lava Axe deals 5 damage to your opponent.
Meant to cut through the body and burn straight to the soul.
When Magma Giant comes into play from your hand, it deals 2 damage to each creature and player. (This includes you and your creatures, including Magma Giant.)
Obsidian Giant
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: After a while, ships stopped sailing within his reach.

trans-unit.source: Ogre Berserker is unaffected by summoning sickness.
The machine does the growling, so the ogre's free to smile.
Ogre Taskmaster can't block.
Three little goblins, enjoying their brew. One bumped an ogre, and then there were two.
Ogre Warrior
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Assault and battery included.
Raging Goblin is unaffected by summoning sickness.
He raged at the world, at his family, at his life. But mostly he just raged.
Untap all your creatures that attacked this turn. You may declare an additional attack this turn.
Spitting Earth deals to any one creature damage equal to the number of mountains you have in play. (This includes both tapped and untapped mountains.)
Destroy any one land.
There goes the neighborhood!
Tremor deals 1 damage to each creature without flying. (This includes your creatures without flying.)
One little goblin shook up the ground. When the dust cleared, no one was found.
Volcanic Hammer deals 3 damage to any one creature or player.
Fire finds its form in the heat of the forge.
You destroy four of your lands and your opponent destroys four of his or her lands. Then Wildfire deals 4 damage to each creature. (This includes your creatures.)
Choose any one creature. This turn, all creatures able to block it do so.
No earthly armor is protection against this sweetness.
Barbtooth Wurm
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: In its lair lies a carpet of bones.
Bear Cub
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Every little cub has its mother's teeth to guard it.\n—Elvish saying
Bee Sting deals 2 damage to any one creature or player.
Busy as a bumblebee, blistered as a goblin.\n—Alaborn saying
Deathcoil Wurm
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: If Deathcoil Wurm attacks and is blocked, you may choose to have it deal its damage to the defending player instead of to the creatures blocking it.
Play Deep Wood only after you're attacked, before you declare blockers. This turn, all damage dealt to you by attacking creatures is reduced to 0.
Golden Bear
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: The elvish scout was scrupulous about the truth. She told the traders that gold lay nearby.

trans-unit.resname: P02·128 | Harmony of Nature | Card Name

trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Tap any number of your creatures. You gain 4 life for each creature tapped this way. (Tapped creatures can't block.)

trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Ironhoof Ox can't be blocked by more than one creature.
The good news is it's vegetarian. The bad news is it just doesn't like you.

Lynx
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Forestwalk (If defending player has any forests in play, Lynx can't be blocked.)
Rarely seen, hardly heard, never caught.
Any one creature gets +4/+4 until the end of the turn.
The nightstalkers' little game of tease-the-squirrel suddenly took an unexpected turn.
You gain 8 life.
The dying ask for water because they know it contains life.
Search your library for a forest card and put that forest into play. Shuffle your library afterwards.
"Every seed planted is another lesson the forest can teach us."\n—Arathel, elvish queen
Norwood Archers
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Norwood Archers can block creatures with flying.
"'Air superiority?' Not while our archers scan the skies."\n—Elvish scout
Norwood Priestess
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: On your turn, before you attack, you may tap Norwood Priestess to put any green creature from your hand into play without paying for it.
Some trees bear deadly fruit.
Norwood Riders
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Norwood Riders can't be blocked by more than one creature.
"Trade my moose? Sure—when I find a *horse* that can spear ten goblins at a time!"
Norwood Warrior
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: If Norwood Warrior attacks and is blocked, it gets +1/+1 until the end of the turn.
"The woods hold peace for those who desire it, but those who seek battle will find me."
Plated Wurm
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: "I'd hate to see the bird that could get *this* wurm!"\n—Alaborn soldier
Razorclaw Bear
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: If Razorclaw Bear attacks and is blocked, it gets +2/+2 until the end of the turn.
One razorclaw is three bears too many.\n—Elvish saying
Renewing Touch
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Choose any number of creature cards in your graveyard and shuffle them into your library.
Death just encourages life the more.
Islandwalk (If defending player has any islands in play, River Bear can't be blocked.)
The bears had been isolated on an island for hundreds of years, until the island sank and the bears didn't.
Salvage
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Take any one card from your graveyard and put that card on the top of your library.
"What was taken shall be restored."\n—Arathel, elvish queen
If Sylvan Basilisk attacks and is blocked, destroy all creatures blocking it. (Destroy the creatures before they deal damage. The Basilisk doesn't damage your opponent.)
Sylvan Yeti
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Sylvan Yeti has power equal to the number of cards you have in your hand.
The deeper the wood, the greater its strength.
Tree Monkey can block creatures with flying.
"They serve the world best on a platter with shallots and onions."\n—Talas sailor
Search your library for a plains, island, swamp, mountain, or forest card and put that land into play. Shuffle your library afterwards.
Wild Ox

trans-unit.source: Swampwalk (If defending player has any swamps in play, Wild Ox can't be blocked.)
It has the run of the swamps, and it knows it.
